item.title: How I Created (And Deployed) My Personal Blog In Under 10 Minutes üê≥
item.description: During my free time before starting my first semester of university, I decided to start a blog! Using Hugo and Github Pages, I was able to have my very cool blog up and running (completely free!) in a very short amount of time. In this post, I will show you how exactly I did this! Hugo üì¶ What Is Hugo? Hugo is a framework for building websites written in GoLang and thus, one of its main selling points is its speed.
